name: DHP_Studio_Black_Convertible_Futon
reviews: The packaging seemed small when it arrived and I was worried about building it but it was easy. Instructions included and finished in less then 15 mins. Comfortable and stylish. I'd recommend it, we are very happy with purchase! :-)

Love this as extra seating. Very modern style. Easy to assemble and switch from sofa to bed. However, a bit small compared to a full size mattress. An average adult's feet hang off the end. Very firm.
Nice space filler, easy to assemble. A little short though.
I ordered this for a lounge area in my salon......but when it came, it looked cheaply made and I had to send it back. It would suit a college dorm well, but not what I expected
Perfect for playroom for the grandkids. Easy assembly.....love it!
description: Dress up your home with style and functionality with this convertible futon from the Studio collection by DHP. Perfect for maximizing limited home space, this futon offers versatile functionality with its multipurpose design.
